title: Two arrested in fatal shooting during illegal drug transaction, police say
text:
Brooks was shot Monday at around 10:40 p.m. during an illegal drug transaction, police said.

The incident was an attempted robbery in the 400 block of Winslow Road, police said. Officers called to the scene found Brooks outside suffering gunshot wounds.

Lechoco, who has been charged as an adult, arranged the illegal transaction before the shooting, police said.

Both Beckwith and Lechoco are in jail without bond. Online court records did not list an attorney for them.

description: One of the suspects in the Oxon Hill killing is 15.
